definition: To enter into a legally recognized union with another person, typically involving a formal ceremony and the establishment of a lifelong partnership. This term is commonly employed to describe the act of getting married or engaging in matrimony.

examples.german: Meine Eltern haben vor 25 Jahren geheiratet.
examples.english: My parents got married 25 years ago.
We will get married next year.

examples.german: Sie hat ihren langjährigen Freund geheiratet.
